sentences.en: Counsel's brief fee be $ 1, 000 with refresher of $ 250.
sentences.cn: 律师的聘请费为1, 000美元还有额外费用250美元.

sentences.en: GLISTER Mouth Refresher Spray - refreshing mint and anise flavour that will leave your mouth always fresh.
sentences.cn: 健齿口腔喷雾 — 含薄荷及茴香清香,令口气保持清新.

sentences.en: He was sent to take a refresher course in the university.
Hold container upright . Depress and spray directly into mouth for a quick and easy breath refresher.
sentences.cn: 将樽身垂直,向口腔按下喷咀,可即时令口气回复清新.

sentences.en: Imagine that you need refresher on how to tie a tie.
sentences.cn: 假设,您需要了解如何打领带.

sentences.en: In addition, picking up some excellent people to take a refresher course is also a good measure.
sentences.cn: 此外，挑选一些优秀人才去进修也是一个很好的方法。

sentences.en: It also ran 18 refresher and re - certification courses for 231 ambulance personnel.
sentences.cn: 此外,也为231名救护人员开办了18项复修及重新考核的课程.

sentences.en: Salesmen have to attend refresher courses frequently.
sentences.cn: 销售人员必须经常参加专业进修.

sentences.en: Sleep with fresh air ( open windows or get air refresher ).
sentences.cn: 睡觉时要有新鲜空气 ( 开窗或使用空气净化器 ).

sentences.en: So we encourage our employees to refresher course.
sentences.cn: 因此,我们鼓励员工参与进修课程.

sentences.en: Suitable as a topcoat for many coating systems, or as a refresher faded coatings.
sentences.cn: 本产品作为面漆兼容多种涂层系统, 更可用于退色旧涂层的装饰翻新.
